AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: master moulder
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is among the most skilled among those in Clan Moulder. [PAWN_pronoun] is a true master at [PAWN_possessive] vile and gruesome work.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: moulder
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is a Clan Moulder bio-engineer. Successfully earning [PAWN_possessive] place in the clan, moulding vile creations deep under the surface.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: moulder guard
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] guards the master moulders' laboratories, and often finds [PAWN_objective]self fighting off whatever monstrous creature created there that has gotten loose.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: moulder assistant
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] helps out the Master Moulders in their well guarded laboratories. Though [PAWN_possessive] masters guard their research, [PAWN_pronoun] has managed to steal what knowledge [PAWN_pronoun] can. Often spending [PAWN_possessive] short spare time reverse engineering tools, and experimenting on [PAWN_possessive] own.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: young assistant
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was taken when young to act as an assistant to one of the Master Moulders. [PAWN_pronoun] mostly ran errands, and wrestled with experiments to keep them under control. Still [PAWN_pronoun] managed to learn one or two things from handling [PAWN_possessive] masters tools.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: lowborn
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in the pits with the majority of the rats, where one must fend for themself, and obey the whims of the clan leaders. [PAWN_pronoun] managed to survive in clan Moulders hold. Living on scraps and managing to avoid some of the moulders experiments.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: clan born
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was clan born, living under Clan Moulder. [PAWN_pronoun] was tossed out to handle the monstrous creations with the rest of the pack. Learning how to wrangle wolf rats, and rat ogres.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: promising
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was clan born, but [PAWN_pronoun] showed promise from young age. [PAWN_pronoun] handled the various beasts, studied them, and tinkered on [PAWN_possessive] own creations.
